usernameInvalidChar: Username should be alphabet or number (e.g. a-z, A-Z, 0-9, "_", "-")
usernameMin: Username should contain at least 2 characters
pwdLengthInvalid: Password should contain at least 8 characters and cannot exceed 32 characters
pwdUnmatchConfirm: Password and confirm password not match
pwdCombinError: Password should include three of following four: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numerals and non-alphanumeric symbols
validError: Validation failure, please correct the marked field(s) below.
